snippet: The ruling from Germany’s highest tribunal clears the way for the government to sign the trade agreement at a European Union meeting on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: The ruling from Germany’s highest tribunal clears the way for the government to sign the trade agreement at a European Union meeting on Tuesday.

headline.main: German Court Rejects Effort to Halt Canada-E.U. Trade Deal
headline.print_headline: Court Nod to Canadian Trade Pact With E.U.
